reviews.review: 对人类来说这是一片神奇的农场，你可以一边玩FGO，一边农场散步，也可以全神贯注和屠夫斗智斗勇，从见面为了200分，到见面为了摇头晃脑打招呼，从对着屠夫诚恳三蹲，到当面拆钩1221，人类的成长过程就是从被保护到保护者的过程。对屠夫来说，你也许会困惑，会愤怒，会被人皇遛到原地砍墙，但是坚持下去，你终将成为那个令人闻风丧胆的··········································································守尸皮脸

I die... a lot. But I have fun doing so and on those rare occurrences where I survive, I think of myself as a god amongst men, the greatest that ever lived, possibly the gamer of my generation.

I bought Dead by Daylight when it was on sale. At first, learning the mechanics took some time. The fear factor when I was started playing was rough. I was afraid to even get out of the closet when I first started. Once, I learned the game and the mechanics. I started to get the handle of it. The game started to be more fun. I enjoy spending my past time in the game. I always try and get my friends to buy or play the game with me. I always recommend the game to people.

Игра Кантрасная где 4 выживших против 1 маньяка сражаються что бы выжить . Но игра также очень наприжённая.Нужно заводить 5 геннираторов и выжившим дадут возможность открыть 1 из 2х варот. . За выживших играть прикольно нервы починка генников помощ товарищам. А заманька тоже очень прикольно ты находишь выжившего доганяешь его и бьёшь и потом нисёшь его на крюк и так каждого пока сущность не убьёт всех. Но в игре есть также маленькие баги но это не мешает играть в кругую DeadbyDaylight!!))

Let me start by saying that I do not play this game competitively. I do not que into games by myself, hoping to level up more. I instead play with my friends, in private games, where perks and items are unlimited. This is where the game shines in my opinion. 

Playing privetly with your mates is something this game does great. It never fails to make us laugh and scream while playing together. 

Playing publicly I feel simply doesn't work. I've tried many times but I couldn't get into it. It's the same strats and moves over and over again if you're the villain. You down someone, pick them up and throw them on a hook, then you stand there next to them not moving, basically denying any chance of them getting rescued. This is both boring and cheesy, especially if you are playing as the survivor, which is what I typically go for. 

All in all, if you plan on playing this game alone, really (and I mean REALLY) ask yourself if it's for you. If however, you are getting this game to play with your friends, then I could not recommend this game enough. Really fun sessions to be had here!

Un jeu très bon et assez unique dans ce qu'il propose.
C'est simple, beaucoup ont essayé de l'imiter, mais aucun n'a réussi à l'égaler.
L'ambiance est excellente, et malgré que le gameplay soit EXTREMEMENT répétitif, on peut jouer plusieurs centaines d'heures avec plaisir, notamment grâce à un système de progression addictif mais surtout au fun que procure le jeu.

De plus, les développeurs ont ENFIN décidés de se pencher régulièrement sur l'équilibrage du jeu. Pendant très longtemps, il y avait des problèmes à ce niveau qui étaient évident, mais ce n'était clairement pas la priorité du studio de s'en occuper.
Aujourd'hui, ils écoutent leur communauté et ça fais super plaisir.
Autre point positif, on a très souvent des ajouts de contenu, qui est souvent de qualité.

Néanmoins, il y a des défauts dont il faut parler.
Premièrement, la communauté est toxique, mais genre, vraiment toxique. League of Legends à côté c'est tranquille. Si jamais vous avez le malheur de tuer les survivants en jouant tueur (oui, c'est votre but), vous allez systématiquement (ou presque) vous faire insulter par ces derniers dans le chat après la game, voir même sur votre profil Steam (je vous invite à aller voir mon profil j'ai gardé les meilleurs commentaires c'est hilarant). Les rage quit sont fréquent des deux côtés, survivant comme tueur.
Deuxièmement, vous aurez beau avoir une bonne connexion internet, c'est le tueur qui est l'hôte de la partie, et si sa connexion est instable, alors la partie sera le festival du bullsh*t (hitbox plus que douteuses, téléportation de votre personnage, actions qui ne se déclenches pas...). Le studio a annoncer qu'il va y avoir des serveurs dédiés, mais on ne sait pas quand. On attend ça avec impatience.
Et enfin, il faut souligner une politique commerciale à vomir. Des skins à 10 euros ? Sérieusement ? C'est plus cher qu'un DLC de deux personnages, et c'est la moitié du prix du jeu, c'est du gros foutage de gueule, personne n'en parle et vu qu'on croise sans arrêt des joueurs avec des skins, c'est que ça se vend bien mais moi je trouve ça scandaleux. J'espère au moins qu'ils investissent tout cet argent dans les serveurs.

Pour conclure, je vous recommande tout de même ce jeu, qui est très fun, encore plus si vous y joué avec des potes, et dont la communauté s'agrandit de jour en jour.

Este es un Juego de "Terror" en el que 4 supervivientes se las apañan para reparar 5 generadores y escapar por las puertas de salida, por otro lado, cada partida cuenta con el asesino (fundamental, obviamente) el cual los persigue para incapacitarlos, y luego colgarlos de un gancho como ropa.

 La Idea es bastante buena en sí, y es bastante entretenido ya que es desafiante, ya que si eres superviviente no puedes andar a "saco" (ya que te encontraran fácilmente), y si eres asesino, tienes una visión reducida por lo que te puede costar encontrar a los supervivientes.

Intentaré ser lo más objetivo posible:
---------------PROS:
-Innovador
-Buena jugabilidad, ya que es fácil de jugar
-Entretenido, ya que perseguir survivors, o escapar del asesino lo es
-Mapas variados
-Supervivientes variados
-Asesinos variados
-Y un largo etc

-----------------CONTRAS
-LOS DESARROLLADORES

¿Por qué los desarrolladores?
-La gente se queja de los camperos, y van los señores desarrolladores y añaden asesinos CAMPEROS (bruja, el cerdo). Esto aparte de que cualquier asesino puede campear, estos dos son personajes facilitan el trabajo de joderle la partida al survivor que colgaron. Encima, se burlan de la gente, diciendo que es una estrategia "válida"
-Perks de survivors desbalanceadas; "Sabotaje", no sirve de una mierda, "Liderazgo" ni hablar, "calle" tampoco, y así muchas más; a lo que voy, todos los survivors terminan usando los mismos perks, "autocuracion", "chungo", los cuales no le facilitan el trabajo a los survivors, si no que joden a los asesinos (perro del nortelano, no come ni deja comer): y, adivina, los señores desarrolladores no hacen ni una mierda por mejorar los otros perks, en vez de eso, los nerfean.
-Asesinos total y completamente desbalanceados, aunque muchos digan lo contrario, Myers te aniquila fácilmente, el pueblerino te encuentra y mata instantaneamente (he jugado con el y por lo general se gana, o escapa 1), la cazadora, y sobre todo, el doctor, a este último no le he ganado ninguna partida; a los 4 minutos ya estan casi todos muertos, es casi imposible escapar de él. Qué pasa, no balancean.
-LOS BUGS; se cierra el juego, se pega en la pantalla de carga, etc, AÚN NO LOS SOLUCIONAN.
-EL MATCHMAKING; no está pulido;  por ejemplo, el juego toma a 4 jugadores latinoamericanos y los exparce en 4 hosts; 2 de cada 4 host es europeo o de un país MUY lejano, por lo cual hay un ping muy alto: aquí es cuando quedan 4 jugadores exparcidos; en vez de llenar 1 host latinoamericano y comenzar a jugar, hay 4 jugadores distribuidos, los cuales tienen que esperar 12 jugadores más para empezar.
-----------------------------------------------------------
Me dió x entrar a jugar nuevamente, y la verdad sigue siendo lo mismo; a la vez que te topas con partidas MUY BUENAS te encuentras con un montón de partidas malas a causa de lo desbalanceado que está el juego, y no, no es x que sea manco, siempre saco sobre 16000 puntos, y tengo buen rango
 PD: Mantengo mi opinión, cuando lo balanceen la cambiaré.

Игра стоит того. Атмосфера страха, некого уныния, куча мусора на локациях, и горстка людей, ищущих выход из этой проблемы. А проблема не заставит себя ждать - Убийца идёт. И он будет шагать по вашим следам, пока последняя капля крови не упадёт с вашего тела... Великолепная графика, места, которые вгрызаются в память и несут за собой лишь положительные, по своему, эмоции, подарит эта игра и затянет вглубь себя. И вряд ли отпустит. Отсюда не стоит уходить. Отсюда не сбежать. И от Него не скрыться... Смерть - это не выход! 5 из 5! Жаль, что я не смог выполнить до конца Воющую Землю, событие, проходившее в игре!

A well executed survival horror game that has its flaws.

[h1]Overview[/h1]
I bought [i]Dead By Daylight[/i] on launch day and played maybe five hours or so of it over the following week. I enjoyed it (mostly as survivor), but for some reason it didn’t stick with me. I tried it again out of boredom in November of 2017 and I don’t know what’s changed, but it somehow has its hooks in me (no pun intended).

As such, this review is based on the current version of the game, and I can’t speak to how it was in the past, especially before the legacy cosmetics from the old, grindy bloodweb. It’s also primarily from the survivor viewpoint, as I’d say 70 of my (currently) 83 hours are from survivor gameplay.

[b]If you want to check out some gameplay, watch some of my highlights here: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=w2Fk2rNSqcc[/b]

Overall, I’m impressed and quite like [i]Dead By Daylight[/i]. It is equal parts tense, frightening, frustrating, and what-the-hell inducing.

As the survivor, your job is to repair enough generators with your team to power doors, which you then need to open to escape and survive the match. As the killer, your job is to stop them from repairing those generators and therefore stop them from escaping.
 
Survivors and killers can both equip themselves with various perks and offerings, which make your job easier. For example, survivors can equip a sprint burst that gives them a big burst of speed to try to lose the killer, and killers can equip a perk that lets them see survivors whenever they injure one. There are a ton of various combinations.

Leveling up is accomplished by filling out a blood web. Bloodpoints are earned to your account regardless of who you play as, so you could use your highest level character with the best perks to grind points and then level up your other characters.

Graphically, the game looks good. The environments are both dark and creepy, and there’s lot of little details in pretty much every aspect of the world. Sound plays a huge role, as you’ll be able to figure out where the killer is and which side they’re coming from, potentially giving you that extra few seconds you need to escape. The core gameplay loop doesn’t ever change (repair gens > rescue friends > escape or kill people), but it somehow remains fun.

Assuming you own all the DLC, there is a large amount of survivors and killers to level. The max level is 50, but you can prestige three times, making the unofficial level cap 200. The game will keep you playing for a long time if you choose to.

On the flip side, bugs. There are countless bugs that BHVR (the developer) seem to not give a damn about. You’ll join a lobby and despite only three of four people being ready, the game somehow starts, and the scoreboard at the end will only show you. Or there are a ton of visual bugs, such as your rank never changing despite you earning enough points to warrant it.

My biggest gripe is that the game uses peer-to-peer matchmaking, and it’s always the killer that acts as host, so you’re at the mercy of a killer who may be in the middle of nowhere, or stuck on 20 year old dialup and refuses to update. This also leads to many types of disconnection issues, to which there is no recourse. You use an expensive offering and the killer disconnects before the match even starts? Oh well, screw you.

BHVR has stated that it’s a “complex” and “involved” issue to figure out how to punish disconnections, but if they had used dedicated servers, it wouldn’t be an issue. Unfortunately, they chose not to spend the money so now they’re in a “oh well, we’re too lazy to figure it out kthx” position. Sadly this does not seem to ever be something that will change, and therefore will always be the biggest issue with the game.

My second biggest issue is, as survivors, you cannot see who the killer is, but the killer can see your name. So, BHVR basically protects the killer against survivors who may recognize them as someone who camps or plays in a way they disagree with, forcing them into a game and either dealing with it, or leaving the match and incurring a penalty.

[h1]Pros[/h1]
[list][*]Super fun gameplay loop that keeps you on your toes
[*]Tense gameplay
[*]Surprising amount of variety for what the game is
[*]Lots of survivors and killers to fully level
[*]Enough map selection and random placement of items to keep the game fresh
[*]Great licensed DLC (Nightmare On Elm Street, SAW, Texas Chainsaw Massacre, Halloween)
[*]Tons of various loadout and perk combinations to keep the game fresh
[/list]
[h1]Cons[/h1]
[list][*]Ridiculous amount of bugs
[*]Fairly inattentive developer who focuses more on DLC and streams than actually fixing any issues, especially those that have been around since launch
[*]Peer-to-peer matchmaking
[/list]
[h1]Summary[/h1]
If you like horror and tense multiplayer gaming, you’ll love [i]Dead By Daylight[/i]. Its gameplay loop will keep you occupied, whether you focus on survivor or killer, and there’s always something different, no matter how much you play.

However, be prepared to lose offerings when you eventually, and quickly, find a killer who disconnects and causes you to lose your items with no punishment to them. There are so many QoL enhancements that could be made that BHVR simply refuses to do.
 
[b][i](Dead By Daylight was purchased directly through Steam. This review has not been paid for in any way.)[/i][/b]

Короче, игоря забавная, местами даже затягивает. Играть интересно что за сурва, что за маньяка. Особого дизбаланса нет, даже если не покупал допконтент, главное - правильно прокачиваться. 
Но есть проблема. Это постоянные игровые баги. Игроков в лобби можно ждать вечно. И самое отвратительное - лок на 60 фпс. У меня 1080 видюха и даже с ней в лобби могут быть фризы и просадки. В других играх, которые требуют куда более серьёзные комплектующие, у меня таким проблем нет. Если подвести некий итог, то скажу, что игру я всё же рекомендую, но отзыв оставляю отрицательный. Пусть фиксят баги, игра не в раннем доступе уже давно, так что подобное просто невозможно терпеть, имхо.

I have logged several hours into this game.....Through the ups and downs of the game...I've played with many friends, with many different strats and perks and as of right now there is nothing left for this game. The survivors cry when anything is shifted out of their favor, the killers at higher ranks almost only camp everything (Hooked survivors, generators, and hatches) and the game has just turned into a cespool of hate from either side of the community. Don't get me wrong I loved this game and I always will, that should be apparent by the amount of hours I've logged. However, the devs of this game don't understand that the game is simply dying out due to these issues not being fixed in some way of another. They can't even punish players for anything whether it be harrassment, hacking, or anything else because they don't "Have dedicated servers". I don't know how many times I have played against killers or survivors that spam the chat with how to play bullshit.
Long Story short this game needs fixed.....as soon as it is I will change this review, I want this game to succeed unlike the others of its kind, but if this keeps up it will keep losing dedicated fans like me.....it needs a rework and if it doesn't get this soon I fear the worst for the community....

I loved this game but if they keep "fixing" issues by introducing perks to counter play styles then this game has nothing left for it.

Buen juego al principio no me gusto , pero luego entendi el rol de este juegazo y me encanto.
muy buen juego y lo recomiendo para pasar un rato con amigos y disfrutar de esta maravilla.

Глубиннейший хоррор на выживание: 4-ро игроков борются с 1-им убийцей. Множество разнообразных навыков, игра "живущая", требует от игроков недюжинной смекалки и быстроты реакции. Жду дальнейших обновлений и играю каждый день в этот проработанный продукт! Игра учит бороться со злом и всегда искать выход из сложившейся ситуации.

Nach 140 Stunden macht mir das Spiel mit Freunden noch immer bock jedoch haben die Developer die Killer viel zu stark gemacht.
----> Neue Spieler die Survivor spielen können einfach nix gegen  solch p2w Killer wie ThePig von Saw überleben, da diese ohne irgenwelch freischaltbaren Perks zu starke Fähigkeiten  haben (-Ansturm;verringerter Terror Radius, -Falle auf den Kopf)
Und Killer beschweren sich zu oft das Survivor zu stark sind dabei muss ein Survivor eine große Menge an Jukes, 
Mindgames beweisen, da unteranderem sogar die einzig "aktive" Waffe generft wurde -RIP Taschenlampe.

Ich persönlich habe dank der Tagesmission den Hilly Billy (Kettensägen Typ) gespielt und hatte von Rang 20-16 keine Probleme gegen die Survivor, wobei ich keine Perks hatte und die schon in Rang 18 "Op Perks" hatten.(Selfcare,Sprintburst,Adrenalin)(NEIN ich habe nicht gecampt).
Und da die Developer mit den Patch (1.9.2/1.9.3) den Killer noch mehr unter den Armen greift viel Spaß da noch klar zu kommen.

Für Neueinsteiger die Spaß haben 9000x zu sterben damit sie Perks haben die halbwegs mithalten können empfehle ich das Spiel aufjeden Fall.
Exelente jogo

其实这游戏对萌新不是很友好..我第一次玩这种类型游戏，一开始玩人真的超级难，玩屠夫也找不到人..
和朋友开黑是很有意思的，没有什么太大压力，朋友溜屠夫我苟修电机，分工很明确，没毛病，嗯。
还是建议萌新找朋友一起玩人类，人类玩熟悉了一点再玩屠夫感觉会更容易一些~
